sentences_examples.sentence_zh: 你一定要来参加我的生日会。
sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Nǐ yīdìng yào lái cānjiā wǒ de shēngrì huì.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Tu dois absolument venir à ma fête d'anniversaire.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: You must come to my birthday party.

sentences_examples.sentence_zh: 我有很重要的事情告诉你。
sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Wǒ yǒu hěn zhòngyào de shìqing gàosu nǐ.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: J'ai quelque chose de très important à te dire.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: I have something very important to tell you.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: La banque est à côté du supermarché.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: The bank is next to the supermarket.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Wǒ de shǒujī méi diàn le.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Mon téléphone n'a plus de batterie.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: My phone is out of battery.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Mon petit frère a dix ans cette année.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: My younger brother is ten years old this year.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: As-tu des questions ?
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Do you have any questions?

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Cette chambre est très propre.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: This room is very clean.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Zǎocān wǒ chī le liǎng gè jīdàn.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: J'ai mangé deux œufs au petit-déjeuner.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: I ate two eggs for breakfast.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: J'aime beaucoup la cuisine chinoise.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: I like Chinese food very much.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Cette pastèque pèse cinq kilos.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: This watermelon weighs five kilograms.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Le chauffeur conduit très prudemment.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: The driver drives very carefully.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Je veux participer à cette compétition.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: I want to participate in this competition.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Veuillez lire cette phrase.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Please read this sentence.

sentences_examples.sentence_zh: 如果明天下雨，我就不去了。
sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Rúguǒ míngtiān xiàyǔ, wǒ jiù bù qù le.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: S'il pleut demain, je n'irai pas.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: If it rains tomorrow, I won't go.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Veuillez répondre à ma question.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Please answer my question.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Habiter ici est très pratique.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Living here is very convenient.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Wǒ měitiān hē yī bēi niúnǎi.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Je bois un verre de lait tous les jours.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: I drink a glass of milk every day.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Je crois que tu peux réussir.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: I believe you can succeed.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Wǒ měitiān jīngguò zhè tiáo jiē.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Je passe par cette rue tous les jours.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: I pass by this street every day.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Ce lit est très confortable.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: This bed is very comfortable.
